description: Update an artifact with the specified attributes. All parameters are optional, except that cef_field and cef_value must both be provided if one is provided.

inputs.description: ID of the artifact to update, which is required.
inputs.name: artifact_id

inputs.description: The name of the CEF field to populate in the artifact, such as "destinationAddress" or "sourceDnsDomain". Required only if cef_value is provided.
inputs.name: cef_field

inputs.description: The value of the CEF field to populate in the artifact, such as the IP address, domain name, or file hash. Required only if cef_field is provided.
inputs.name: cef_value

inputs.description: The CEF data type of the data in cef_value. For example, this could be "ip", "hash", or "domain". Optional, but only operational if cef_field is provided.
inputs.name: cef_data_type
